long_description: Great for weekend getaways, the soft-sided Patagonia 26L Transport Shoulder Bag made from recycled material meets most airline carry-on requirements and holds most 17 in. laptops. Main zippered compartment opens like a book for easy packing and access. Second zippered compartment has several organizational pockets for your passport, smart phone, boarding pass, etc. Third zippered pocket on main panel holds miscellaneous items. Dedicated, zippered electronics compartment opens flat for hassle-free trips through security; internal sleeve holds up to a 15 in. laptop; pockets hold small tablet and cords. Ergonomic shoulder strap removes if you'd rather carry the bag by its 2 haul handles. Patagonia 26L Transport Shoulder Bag has a rear sleeve that slides over wheeled-luggage handles.
short_description: Great for weekend getaways, the soft-sided Patagonia 26L Transport Shoulder Bag made from recycled material meets most airline carry-on requirements and holds most 17 in. laptops.
